Below are the steps for accessing Twitter's stream API's.

#1) Create an app in Twitter (If not Registered in Twitter, register)
  - go to apps.twitter.com 
  - Click on "Create New App" and fill required information
    * Name
    * Description
    * Website- your twitter profile link
    * Callback- http://127.0.0.1:1410
    * Check the agreement and Register
    
  - Go to your app
  - Go to Keys and Access Tokens
  - Below click on "Create My Access Token"
  
#2) Now in "Keys and Access Tokens" you will see
* Consumer Key (API Key)
* Consumer Secret (API Secret)
* Access Token
* Access Token Secret

#(These keys are required to collect data from Twitter and work on it.)
